title: Create a custom target to run any command
description: Create a custom target to run any command.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use to invoke the command?

outputs.description: Allows you to specify where the build artifacts are stored. This allows Nx Cloud to pick them up correctly, in the case that the build artifacts are placed somewhere other than the top level dist folder.
